function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardized exergame protocols","Impact":"Difficulty in determining the most beneficial recommendations and high level of heterogeneity","Mitigation":"Standardize exergame protocols for different clinical populations","Technologies":"Digital health platforms for data collection and analysis","People":"Patients undergoing exergame interventions","Owner":"Healthcare professionals and researchers"},{"Description":"Limited scientific work and research on exergame interventions","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the benefits and risks of exergaming, leading to incomplete recommendations","Mitigation":"Conduct more rigorous scientific research on exergame interventions","Technologies":"Health research databases and collaboration platforms","People":"Health researchers, clinicians, and funding agencies","Owner":"Research institutions and funding agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized timing for assessment of anxiety levels post-exergame sessions","Impact":"Inability to determine the accurate impact of exergame interventions on anxiety levels","Mitigation":"Standardize the timing for assessment of anxiety levels post-exergame sessions","Technologies":"Health tracking and monitoring devices","People":"Patients participating in exergame interventions","Owner":"Healthcare professionals and researchers"}]}
